thread.title: Another beautiful stay.
thread.title_full: Another beautiful stay. - Review of Renaissance Paris Vendome Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Esteban100
title: Another beautiful stay.
text:
I am travelling to Paris four to five times a year and always book my stays at the Renaissance Vendome.
My last stay, this week end, was, again, exceptionnal.
The reception team is just phenomenal, they go out of their way to make you feel welcome and at home, a very special thanks to all of them, but specially to Michelle and Georgi for their exceptional service and making you feel at home.
The restaurant is closed for the time being, so breakfast is being served in the small bar area which is often crowded but the food is really nice and the staff is just trying to do everything they can to have guest having a good time. Anne, Victor and Christophe are absolutely superb, always smilling and going a step beyong what is expected.
I am really looking forward to seeing the new restaurant and the new lobby and have also been told that the rooms will get refreshed soon.
Room Tip: Some rooms on the 5th floor have small balconies. See more room tips
